content.raw:
Yes, recently @JenniferBuehler has been updating gazebo's default branch to use the latest release of dart (version 6) and has been improving the feature parity as she goes. A list of issues with our dart integration is categorized in the issue tracker:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues?status=new&status=open&component=physics%3A%3ADARTPhysics

Thanks for your interest!
content.html:
Yes, recently @JenniferBuehler has been updating gazebo's default branch to use the latest release of dart (version 6) and has been improving the feature parity as she goes. A list of issues with our dart integration is categorized in the issue tracker:

  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues?status=new&status=open&component=physics%3A%3ADARTPhysics

Thanks for your interest!
